content.content: On the main page optimism.io in the governance section I propose a tab (name to be defined) with: -vote in progress/validated votes -incentive request/incentive granted The presentation/explanation is good but I think it would be interesting to show what is happening to involve the community and promote the incentives in progress… Opinions ?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is proposing a new tab for the website optimism.io, which would show the progress of voting and incentives. The author is asking for feedback on the proposal and suggesting that it would be beneficial to involve the community and promote the incentives. A 3rd party could provide constructive criticism on how to improve the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
Author of proposal is explaining proposal
